rag.integrations package

RAG source integration adapters (local filesystem, GitHub, Google Drive).

Submodules

  • rag.integrations.git_sync module
    • run_git()
    • git_env()
    • ensure_git_repo()
    • git_fetch_and_reset()
    • git_rev_parse()
    • git_diff_paths()
    • safe_git_url()

      • DriveFolderInfo.id
      • DriveFolderInfo.name
